author: Stephen Cole
description: It's bitter Giuseppe, best you enjoy this as an aperitivo.
name: Bitter Giuseppe
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro
30 ml Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth

recipeInstructions.text: SPRAY oils from lemon zest twist into stirring glass and drop zest into glass
Add other ingredients, STIR with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
